oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of Sgt. Charles Ward, Co. E, 60th Ind. Inf. Regt., USA to his mother
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ward notes that he is in good health and wishes the same for her. He reports that he has been "on scout for six days to see if we could find eney [sic] rebels." He explains the prisoner exchange at New Orleans and asks his mother to give his best to all inquiring friends and to "all the young ladays [sic]."
